msg: Changed pushes of current context node and template to single node list with pushPair and popPair methods.

author: sboag
msg: Changed the m_recursionLimit variable to package private, so it can be accessed by the TranformerImpl in time-critical loops.

author: sboag
msg: Changed some method calling to property access on queued events.
Pass false instead of true for flush for the default startPrefix mapping,
which seemed to fix the namespace bug (more testing needed).

author: sboag
msg: Reduce method calling vs. property access.
